# DiamantePro Flutter App - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
- **Type**: Flutter Mobile Application
- **Purpose**: Mobile client for Diamante PRO system
- **Backend**: Python/Flask API deployed on Heroku
- **Platforms**: Android and iOS

## Completed Steps
✅ Created copilot-instructions.md file
✅ Created Flutter project structure manually
✅ Configured dependencies (http, provider, shared_preferences)
✅ Created API service layer for HTTP requests
✅ Set up basic screens and models
✅ Configured Android and iOS native files

## Next Steps
- Install Flutter SDK on your system
- Update API URL in lib/config/api_config.dart with your Heroku backend URL
- Run `flutter pub get` to install dependencies
- Test the app with `flutter run`
